column2:
SELECT distinct(p.gene_id)
FROM projects p, project_sponsors ps
WHERE ps.sponsor_id = '$sponsor_id'
AND ps.project_id = p.id
AND p.targeting_type = '$targeting_type'
AND p.species_id = '$species'
ORDER BY p.gene_id
distributable clones;frame-shift clones;het clones;total genotyped clones;electroporation of iPSCs;donor vectors constructed;crispr plasmids constructed;ordered crispr primers
